title: Sinequa Named a Leader in Big Data Search and Knowledge Discovery Solutions by Independent Research Firm
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/24/2015 @ 11:44 AM Companies mentioned in this article: Sinequa 
NEW YORK, NY -- (Marketwired) -- 09/24/15 -- Sinequa , a leader in real-time Big Data search and analytics, today announced that it was named a leader in the "The Forrester Wave: Big Data Search and Knowledge Discovery Solutions, Q3 2015"(1). The Sinequa Big Data Search & Analytics Platform was recognized in the report as the Top Ranked Current Offering among all evaluated vendors. 
Forrester Research stated, "Sinequa puts powerful [Natural Language Processing] to work in surprising scenarios. Sinequa is more tightly focused on advanced NLP than nearly any other vendor." 
The Forrester report also noted, "[Sinequa's] strategy of developing new data connectors according to customer need allows it to support enterprises with uniquely complex or ever-evolving enterprise data scenarios." 
"It's a pivotal time for Big Data enterprises as they look to the new generation of search and analytics technology to enable them to realize the full potential of their data assets," said Alexandre Bilger, President and CEO, Sinequa. "We are pleased to be recognized as a leader by Forrester with the top ranked current offering in this transformational data era. We work to deliver the solution for organizations looking to access the information that will give them the greater insights that, in turn, deliver true competitive value." 
Sinequa was named a leader among nine vendors evaluated in the Forrester report. The vendor rankings are based on a comprehensive set of evaluation criteria including past research, user need assessments, and vendor and expert interviews, measuring companies across three categories -- current offerings, strategy and market presence. In the current offering category, Forrester evaluated each solution's architecture, security, administration, data acquisition and indexing, end user features, customization and business application support. 
The Forrester Wave: Big Data Search and Knowledge Discovery Solutions, Q3 2015 report is available for download here: http://www.sinequa.com/forresterwave-2015 . 
About Sinequa Sinequa provides a real-time Big Data Search & Analytics platform for Fortune Global 2000 companies and government agencies. It offers users Unified Information Access to all textual and database data, supported by powerful analytics. Millions of users in the world's largest and most information-intensive organizations, including Airbus, AstraZeneca, Atos, Biogen, Credit Agricole, Mercer, and Siemens, rely on Sinequa to put business-critical information at the fingertips of their employees. Sinequa develops its expertise and its business around the world with a broad network of technology and business partners. For more information, visit http://www.sinequa.com/ . 
(1) Forrester Research, Inc., "The Forrester Wave: Big Data Search and Knowledge Discovery Solutions, Q3 2015", Mike Gualtieri and Rowan Curran with Holger Kisker, Ph.D., Derek Nahabedian and Tyler Thurston Contact:
